name: Hot Dog Hero
description:
Squirt mustard and ketchup on every hot dog according to the beats of 4 different songs. Feel the rhythm, get a high combo streak and aim for the best high score!

You should start with "Couch Potato", since it's the easiest, then go on to "Trial of Spikes". The last two songs ("Welcome to the Club" and "Electronic Battle Theme 5") provide a challenge for the most experienced rhythm gamers out there.

Controls

Press the left mouse button when a yellow mustard note is in the bottom white cirlce. Press the right mouse button when a red ketchup note is in the top white circle.

Hold the according button for longer notes and release when the note is over.

You can press 'R' to quickly restart a level, or press 'Escape' to return to the menu.

You can remap the mustard and ketchup buttons in the settings.

Accessibility

You can change audio volumes, remap controls and even adjust the delay of your input device! Colorblind people should also be able to play the game without any problems, since mustard and ketchup are always in their respective lanes.

Credits of the Songs:
  • "Couch Potato" by WOW Sound
  • "Trial of Spikes" by Cyberleaf
  • "Welcome to the Club" by Jonathan Shaw
  •  "Electronic Battle Theme 5" by Scythuz
